markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Community Knowledge](/Feats.aspx?ID=3962) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Kashrishi" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=462" />
<trait label="Occult" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=120" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 42</row>

**Frequency**
once per hour

**Trigger**
You attempt a skill check requiring 3 actions or fewer.

</column>

---

You commune with the psychic echoes of your ancestors and community, channeling their experiences into yourself. You gain a +2 status bonus on the triggering skill check.
name: Community Knowledge
